sourcesContent:
const styles = {
  wrapper: { padding: "25px 20px", maxWidth: 1350, margin: "auto" },

  pageTitle: { fontSize: 26, fontWeight: 600, color: "#333" },

  headerTop: {
    display: "flex",
    justifyContent: "space-between",
    alignItems: "center",
    marginBottom: 25,
  },

  addBtn: {
    display: "flex",
    alignItems: "center",
    gap: 6,
    background: "#ee4d2d",
    color: "#fff",
    textDecoration: "none",
    padding: "10px 16px",
    borderRadius: 6,
    fontSize: 14,
  },

  tableHeader: {
    display: "flex",
    padding: "12px 10px",
    background: "#fafafa",
    border: "1px solid #eee",
    borderRadius: 6,
    fontWeight: 600,
    color: "#555",
    marginBottom: 10,
  },

  tableRow: {
    display: "flex",
    padding: "12px 10px",
    borderBottom: "1px solid #eee",
    alignItems: "center",
    transition: "0.2s",
  },

  rowCell: { fontSize: 14, color: "#333" },

  productCell: {
    display: "flex",
    alignItems: "center",
    gap: 12,
  },

  thumbnail: {
    width: 65,
    height: 65,
    objectFit: "cover",
    borderRadius: 6,
    border: "1px solid #eee",
  },

  skuText: { fontSize: 12, color: "#888" },

  actionLink: {
    display: "block",
    marginBottom: 4,
    color: "#007bff",
    textDecoration: "none",
    cursor: "pointer",
  },
};
